question.text: Questionnaire code:
Interviewer:
Interview Date:
Province/District:
Ward:
Village/Town/Station:
GPS Coordinates:
PEPE Health facility?
If no, state PEPE health facility:

questionGroup.heading: A.	CHARACTERISTICS OF THE HEALTH FACILITY AND WORKERS

question.text: A1. Name of Health Facility:
A2. Type of health facility:
A3. Agency type:
A3a. If other religious, please specify:
A3b. If private, please specify:
A4. How would you describe accessibility, in terms of the location, of this health facility?  (similar to PARI codes for schools)
A5. In what year was this health facility established? (best guess if unsure)
A6. Insert gender of respondent:
A7. Insert age of respondent:
A8. Are you the Officer In Charge (OIC) for this [Health Centre, Aid Post] health facility?
A8a. If no, what is your position?
A8b. What is the gender of the OIC?
A9. Can you speak the local tok ples in this community?
A10. Were you born in this district?
A11. How many years have you worked in your position at this health facility? [insert years including this year and month]
A12. What is your highest qualification?
A13. Currently, how many health workers are supposed to be posted (on the roll) to this health facility? - please write '999' if don't know
A14a. How many TOTAL health workers regularly turn up to work at this health facility? - please write '999' if don't know
A14b. How many FEMALE health workers regularly turn up to work at this health facility? - please write '999' if don't know
A14c. How many MALE health workers regularly turn up to work at this health facility?- please write '999' if don't know
A15. How many health workers are present at the health facility today (time of survey)? - please write '999' if don't know
A16. In the past month, how many health workers at the health facility were away for more than two working days? -(please write '999' if don't know)
A17. What are the three main reasons that health workers are away at this facility? [Multiple responses possible]
A18. If health workers are absent for a long time, how do you cover shifts? [Multiple responses possible]
A19. When was the last leadership or management training you attended? [year]
A20. How many health workers have attended in-service training in the last 12 months? (please write '999' if don't know)
A21. How many health workers are currently enrolled in higher education? (for instance, to upgrade qualification from certificate to diploma) (please write '999' if don't know)
A22. Currently, what is your official health worker grade?
A23. Are you being paid at that grade?
A24. In 2025, have you usually received your pay on time?
A25. Have you been paid the allowances that you were eligible for in 2024?
A26. Do you have another source of income apart from this job?
A27. How many days a week is this health facility usually open? [Write number of days]
A28. On average, how many hours a day is the health facility usually open? Insert hours [please write '999' if don't know]
A29. Is the health facility open for patient visits today?
A29a. If no, why not? [MR]
A30. What time did you open today?
A30a. If time, what exact time did you open?
A31. What time will you close today?
A31a. If time, what exact time did you close?
A32. How many patients are seen in a typical day at this health facility in total? [please write '999' if don't know]

help.text: [If yes, ask to see records for next questions! Still ask questions if records are not available]

question.text: A33. Does this health facility keep attendance records of patient visits?

help.text: please write '999' if don't know

question.text: A34. How many patients visited the health facility yesterday in total? [Best guess if records not available]
A35. How many patients visited the health facility last month in total? [Best guess if records not available]
A36. Have the number of patients changes over the past year?
A37. Please indicate the main reason for a change:
NOTES TO EXPLAIN CONTEXT FOR SECTION A (If required):

questionGroup.heading: B. INFRASTRUCTURE OF CLINIC, HOUSING & SUPPLIES

question.text: INSTRUCTION: Ask the health OIC if (s)he would mind taking you on a tour of the health facility to observe the infrastructure as you are completing the next sections. Be flexible and listen to the preference of the OIC as they might prefer to do this after the interview…
B1. What are the total number of clinic rooms at this health facility?
B2a1. How many Consultation Clinic Rooms are there at health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2a2. How many Consultation Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2a3. How many Consultation Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2a4. How many Consultation Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2a5. How many Consultation Clinic Rooms are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2b1. How many Outpatient Clinic Rooms are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2b2. How many Outpatient Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2b3. How many Outpatient Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2b4. How many Outpatient Clinic Rooms are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2b5. How many Outpatient Clinic Rooms are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2c1. How many Admission Room are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2c2. How many Admission Room are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2c3. How many Admission Room are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2c4. How many Admission Room are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2c5. How many Admission Room are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2d1. How many Labor / delivery room are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2d2. How many Labor / delivery room are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2d3. How many Labor / delivery room are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2d4. How many Labor / delivery room are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2d5. How many Labor / delivery room are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2e1. How many Maternity Wards are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2e2. How many Maternity Wards are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2e3. How many Maternity Wards are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2e4. How many Maternity Wards are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2e5. How many Maternity Wards are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2f1. How many General Wards are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2f2. How many General Wards are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2f3. How many General Wards are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2f4. How many General Wards are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2f5. How many General Wards are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2g1. How many Drug Storage Rooms are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2g2. How many Drug Storage Rooms are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2g3. How many Drug Storage Rooms are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2g4. How many Drug Storage Rooms are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2g5. How many Drug Storage Rooms are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2h1. How many Disease Control Room are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2h2. How many Disease Control Room are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2h3. How many Disease Control Room are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2h4. How many Disease Control Room are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2h5. How many Disease Control Room are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2i1. How many Other Room are there at this health facility? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2i2. Please specify the other room:
B2i3. How many Other Room are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt? [exclude those in the process of construction]
B2i4. How many Other Room are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2i5. How many Other Room are in such a bad state that they need some maintenance? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B2i6. How many Other Room are in a suitable condition? [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]
B3. How many clinic rooms currently have a roof that leaks when it rains?
B4. How many clinic rooms lack chairs and tables?
B5. How many clinic rooms can be secured at night?
B6. What are the total number of health worker houses are there at this facility?

help.text: [exclude those in the process of construction]

question.text: B7a. How many permanent health worker houses are there at this facility?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7l. How many bush material health worker houses are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7m. How many bush material health worker houses are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance?

question.text: B7o. How many bush material health worker houses are in a suitable condition?
B7p. How many health workers living in their own accommodation (e.g. self-owned, rental, family) at this facility?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7q. How many health worker living in their own accommodation (e.g. self-owned, rental, family) that are in such a bad state that they need to be completely rebuilt?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7r. How many health worker living in their own accommodation (e.g. self-owned, rental, family) that are in such a bad state that they need major maintenance?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7s. How many health worker living in their own accommodation (e.g. self-owned, rental, family) that are in such a bad state that they need  some maintenance?

help.text: [exclude those that need to be completely rebuilt]

question.text: B7t. How many health worker living in their own accommodation (e.g. self-owned, rental, family) that are in a suitable condition?
B8. Does the health facility currently have any electricity today?
B9. If yes, how is the power supplied? [tick all that apply]
B10. If yes, How many clinic rooms have electricity that works?
B11. What is the health facility’s main source of water?
B12. Are health workers able to use this water source today when treating patients?
B13. If yes, in 2024, has that water been available from this source for all this year?

help.text: Do not ask this question for Aid Posts:

question.text: B14. Is the water supply connected to the delivery room and working today?
B15. How many times was the health facility broken into in 2024? [please write '999' if don't know]

INSTRUCTION: For the next questions about facility, READ ALOUD: I want to ask you about the availability of particular assets important to the operations of this health facility. If you could state that you either have: No provision, Poor provision, Adequate provision or Good provision for the following facility:
B16. What is the availability of health facility vehicle [for administration]?
B17. What is the availability of ambulance [car and/or boat depending on location]?
B18. What is the availability of kitchen facilities?
B19. What is the availability of beds with mattresses?
B20. What is the availability of patient waiting room/space?
B21. What is the availability of land for expansion? [Note: Consider ownership of the property in answer]
B22. What is the main type of toilet facilities?
B23. Are there enough toilets?
B23a. If no, how many more are needed?
B24a1. How far is the closest source for the Referral Health Centre/Hospital? [in km]
B24a2. How would you get there?
B24a3. How long does it take to get there?
B24a4. If days, how many days?
B24a5. If hours, how many hours?
B24a6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24b1. How far is the closest source for the Commercial source of drugs? [in km]
B24b2. How would you get there?
B24b3. How long does it take to get there?
B24b4. If days, how many days?
B24b5. If hours, how many hours?
B24b6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24c1. How far is the closest source for the nearest trade store that sells basic materials / supplies  [eg. fuel, building materials]? [in km]
B24c2. How would you get there?
B24c3. How long does it take to get there?
B24c4. If days, how many days?
B24c5. If hours, how many hours?
B24c6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24d1. How far is the closest source for the Bank [able to cash cheques or disperse cash]? [in km]
B24d2. How would you get there?
B24d3. How long does it take to get there?
B24d4. If days, how many days?
B24d5. If hours, how many hours?
B24d6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24e1. How far is the closest source for the Provincial capital? [in km]
B24e2. How would you get there?
B24e3. How long does it take to get there?
B24e4. If days, how many days?
B24e5. If hours, how many hours?
B24e6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24f1. How far is the closest source for the District capital? [in km]
B24f2. How would you get there?
B24f3. How long does it take to get there?
B24f4. If days, how many days?
B24f5. If hours, how many hours?
B24f6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24g1. How far is the closest source for the operating air strip [in km]
B24g2. How would you get there?
B24g3. How long does it take to get there?
B24g4. If days, how many days?
B24g5. If hours, how many hours?
B24g6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B24h1. How far is the closest source for the mobile phone reception [in km]
B24h2. How would you get there?
B24h3. How long does it take to get there?
B24h4. If days, how many days?
B24h5. If hours, how many hours?
B24h6. If minutes, how many minutes?
B25. Currently, does this health facility at the moment have working refrigeration facilities for drugs?
B26. Currently, do you or your staff order medicines for the health facility?
B27. After placing your order, how long does it normally take for you to receive these drugs? [approximate in days] - please write '999' if don't know
B28. Has this health facility received the 100% drug supply kits [These are boxes of essential medicines]
b29. If yes, when did you last receive 100% drug kits at this health facility? [Month,Year]
B30a1. If a person needed the panadol today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30a2. Is panadol free to the patient?
B30a3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30a4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks panadol was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30a5. How were panadol received?
B30a6. When was the last panadol were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30b1. If a person needed fansidar today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30b2. Is fansidar free to the patient?
B30b3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30b4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks fansidar was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30b5. How were fansidar received?
B30b6. When was the last fansidar were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30c1. If a person needed TB blister packs today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30c2. Is TB blister packs free to the patient?
B30c3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30c4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks TB blister packs was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30c5. How were TB blister packs received?
B30c6. When was the last TB blister packs were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30d1. If a person needed condoms today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30d2. Is condoms free to the patient?
B30d3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30d4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks condoms was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30d5. How were condoms received?
B30d6. When was the last condoms were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30e1. If a person needed Liniment today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30e2. Is Liniment free to the patient?
B30e3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30e4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Liniment was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30e5. How were Liniment received?
B30e6. When was the last Liniment were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30f1. If a person needed depo-provera today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30f2. Is depo-provera free to the patient?
B30f3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30f4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks depo-provera was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30f5. How were depo-provera received?
B30f6. When was the last depo-provera were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30g1. If a person needed measles vaccine today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30g2. Is measles vaccine free to the patient?
B30g3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30g4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks measles vaccine was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30g5. How were measles vaccine received?
B30g6. When was the last measles vaccine were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30h1. If a person needed Ergometrine / Oxytocin today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30h2. Is Ergometrine / Oxytocin free to the patient?
B30h3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30h4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Ergometrine / Oxytocin was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30h5. How were Ergometrine / Oxytocin received?
B30h6. When was the last Ergometrine / Oxytocin were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30i1. If a person needed Oral Rehydration Solution today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30i2. Is Oral Rehydration Solution free to the patient?
B30i3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30i4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Oral Rehydration Solution was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30i5. How were Oral Rehydration Solution received?
B30i6. When was the last Oral Rehydration Solution were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30j1. If a person needed Oxygen today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30j2. Is Oxygen free to the patient?
B30j3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30j4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Oxygen was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30j5. How were Oxygen received?
B30j6. When was the last Oxygen were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30k1. If a person needed Amoxicillin tablets today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30k2. Is Amoxicillin tablets free to the patient?
B30k3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30k4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Amoxicillin tablets was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30k5. How were Amoxicillin tablets received?
B30k6. When was the last Amoxicillin tablets were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30l1. If a person needed Baby books/records today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30l2. Is Baby books/records free to the patient?
B30l3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30l4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Baby books/records was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30l5. How were Baby books/records received?
B30l6. When was the last Baby books/records were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30m1. If a person needed Pregnancy tests today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30m2. Is Pregnancy tests free to the patient?
B30m3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30m4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Pregnancy tests was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30m5. How were Pregnancy tests received?
B30m6. When was the last Pregnancy tests were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30n1. If a person needed Malaria – Rapid Diagnosis Testing today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30n2. Is Malaria – Rapid Diagnosis Testing free to the patient?
B30n3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30n4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Malaria – Rapid Diagnosis Testing was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30n5. How were Malaria – Rapid Diagnosis Testing received?
B30n6. When was the last Malaria – Rapid Diagnosis Testing were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B30o1. If a person needed Mala wan (1) today, would the facility be able to provide them (is it available)?
B30o2. Is Mala wan (1) free to the patient?
B30o3. If no, how much would a patient normally pay? [in Kina]
B30o4. In the past year, what was the longest number of weeks Mala wan (1) was unavailable? [answer in weeks]
B30o5. How were Mala wan (1) received?
B30o6. When was the last Mala wan (1) were received? [Insert Month and Year]
B31. Currently, are you or your staff involved with collecting these drug supply kits or do you receive them directly at the health facility?
B32. Do you normally know when to expect drug supply kits?
B33. Were you satisfied with the contents of the drug supply kits in the last delivery?
B34. Why were you satisfied or dissatisfied?
B35. Do you currently receive more drugs from the drugs supply kit sets or ordered through the Area Medical Store?
B36. What additional drugs should be supplied in the kits?
NOTES TO EXPLAIN CONTEXT FOR SECTION B (If required)
C1. Is there a supervisor for this health facility? [This could be the person you report to or has responsibility for the health facility]
C2. If yes, what is the supervisor’s position?
C3. Is the supervisor visit in 2025?
C3a. If visit, how many times did the supervisor visit so far in 2025?
C3b. If no, when was the last time the supervisor visited? [year]
C4. Is the supervisor visit in 2024?
C4a. If visit, how many times did the supervisor visit in 2024?
C4b. If no, when was the last time the supervisor visited? [year]
C5. What was the main purpose of the last supervisor’s visit?
C6a. At that visit, did the supervisor meet with health workers?
C6b. At that visit, did the supervisor meet with patients / community?
C6c. At that visit, did the supervisor check medical supplies (e.g equipment/drugs)?
C6d. At that visit, did the supervisor check patient records?
C7. What was the main kind of feedback was given at the end of that visit? [MR}
C8. Did anything happen as a result of the visit?
C9. Did a medical doctor worked at this health facility in the past year?
C9a. If no, was a medical doctor visited this health facility in the past year?
C9b. If yes, how many times has a medical doctor visited this health facility in the past year? [number of visits]
C10. If no, When was the last time a medical doctor from a hospital visited this health facility? [Do not include medical students] - Month  /  Year
C11. Did a Health Extension Officer (HEO) worked at this health facility in the past year?
C11a. If no, was a Health Extension Officer (HEO) visited this health facility in the past year?
C11b. If yes, how many times has a Health Extension Officer (HEO) visited this health facility in the past year? [number of visits]
C12. If no, When was the last time a Health Extension Officer (HEO) from a hospital visited this health facility? [Do not include medical students] - Month  /  Year
C13. Has the Provincial Health Authority (PHA) reform improved supervision for this health facility?
C14. Has the PHA reform improved visits from medical doctors and HEOs for this health facility?
C15. Currently, is there a Village Health Committee (VHC) or its equivalent that supports this facility?
C16. If yes, do you know how many times the VHC met in the past year? [please insert '999' if don't know]
C17. If yes, when was the last VHC meeting?
C18. What proportion of the community attends VHC meetings?
C19. In the past year, did the OIC or VHC ever meet with the community to discuss health facility issues?
C20. If yes, what proportion of the community attends?
C21. In the past year have members of the community volunteered to assist the health facility?
C22. In past year, have health workers conducted health promotion activities in the community?
NOTES TO EXPLAIN CONTEXT FOR SECTION C  (If required)

questionGroup.heading: D. HEALTH FACILITY FINANCES AND SOURCES OF SUPPORT - INPUTS

help.text: NOTE: If first response is no, ask the OIC if no fees includes everything such as ambulance fees (including fuel), domestic violence, tribal fighting as per below list. If yes to any of the below visitation types the answer should be yes.

question.text: D1. Do patients ever have to pay for any kind of visitation to the health facility?
D2a. How much do patients have to pay for the general consultation for child? [in Kina] - please type '0' if nothing, and '999' if don't know
D2b. How much do patients have to pay for the general consultation for adult? [in Kina] - please type '0' if nothing, and '999' if don't know
